name: Polytec TC 432
description: Polytec TC 432 is a thixotropic, two component, highly thermally conductive, electrically insulating epoxy for thermal management in micro and power electronics, energy engineering etc. Polytec TC 432 has an excellent adhesion to ceramic, glass, semiconductor materials, ferrous and non ferrous metals and most plastics. The material can be applied via dispensing, screen printing, or manual application.
